Name: SmokeEffectColorArea
Notes: An area that changes the primary and environment colors of the player's running dust cloud particles when entered.

Obj_arg0.Name: Primary Red
Obj_arg0.Description: The primary color's red component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg1.Name: Primary Green
Obj_arg1.Description: The primary color's green component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg2.Name: Primary Blue
Obj_arg2.Description: The primary color's blue component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg3.Name: Environment Red
Obj_arg3.Description: The environment color's red component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg4.Name: Environment Green
Obj_arg4.Description: The environment color's green component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg5.Name: Environment Blue
Obj_arg5.Description: The environment color's blue component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
